data.name: SubPhaser
data.description: Phase and visualize subgenomes of an allopolyploid or hybrid based on the repetitive kmers.

evidence: "Here, we develop `SubPhaser` to phase subgenomes... The tool also identifies genome-wide subgenome-specific regions and long terminal repeat retrotransposons (LTR-RTs), which will provide insights into the evolutionary history of allopolyploidization."
Usage is via a command-line tool: "Run with default parameters: `subphaser -i genome.fasta.gz -c sg.config`" indicating an end-user analysis application.

Container-based distribution is explicitly documented: "Alternatively, you can run `subphaser` through Singularity/Apptainer container: ... `apptainer pull subphaser.sif library://shang-hongyun/collection/subphaser.sif:1.2.6`"
